Description:
NuGet is evolving to deliver stronger security, AI-powered productivity, and a modern package management experience for .NET developers. This session highlights the latest innovations, including the Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server that enables AI assistants to streamline package management workflows, NuGet.org becoming the central MCP registry for the .NET ecosystem, enhanced NuGet Audit capabilities for identifying and mitigating vulnerable dependencies, Trusted Publishing for secure and compliant package distribution, and new options for MCP package discovery and sponsorship. Join us to learn how these updates help you work faster, maintain secure and reliable dependencies, and stay ahead in the package ecosystem that powers the .NET community. Title: What's New in NuGet
